title: SVBPH Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 03 Senior Resident Post
description: The Sardar Vallabh Bhai Patel Hospital (SVBPH) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 03 Senior Resident Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, Post-Graduation, or Diploma can grab this chance and apply for the SVBPH Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
